battlecode.common
Class GameConstants

java.lang.Object
  battlecode.common.GameConstants

public final class GameConstants
extends java.lang.Object

Defines game constants used throughout the packages. This class is meant to be used in other classes with an import static battlecode.common.GameConstants.*;.

Field Summary
static double ARCHON_PRODUCTION
          The amount of energon per round an archon produces
static double ATTACK_BONUS_RATE
          The fractional attack bonus per unit height difference
static double BROADCAST_COST_PER_BYTE
          Additional cost per byte of message size
static double BROADCAST_FIXED_COST
          Fixed cost to send a message
static int BYTECODES_PER_ROUND
          The number of bytecodes a robot can execute each round
static double ENERGON_RESERVE_SIZE
          The amount of energon a robot can hold in reserve
static double ENERGON_TRANSFER_RATE
          The amount of energon a robot can receive per round from transfers
static double EVOLVE_COST
          Cost of evolving robot
static int EXCEPTION_BYTECODE_PENALTY
          The bytecode penalty that is imposed each time an exception is thrown
static double INITIAL_SPAWN_RADIUS
          The spawn radius that a tower begins with
static int MAP_MAX_HEIGHT
          The maximum possible map height.
static int MAP_MAX_WIDTH
          The maxiumum possible map width.
static int MAP_MIN_HEIGHT
          The minimum possible map height.
static int MAP_MIN_WIDTH
          The minumum possible map width.
static double MIN_SPAWN_RADIUS
          The minimum spawn radius that a tower can have
static int MORTAR_DELAY_ROUNDS
          Number of rounds mortar attack is spread over
static double MORTAR_MULTIPLIER
          Damage multiplier for mortars when attacking towers
static double MOVEMENT_PENALTY_RATE
          The fractional movement penalty based on terrain height
static int NUMBER_OF_INDICATOR_STRINGS
          The number of indicator strings that a player can associate with a robot
static int STACK_SIZE_LIMIT
          The maximum stack size a robot can use without incurring penalties
static double TOWER_DECAY_FACTOR
          The factor by which towers decay when killed
static double TOWER_START_POINTS
          The amount of points a tower is initially worth
static double TOWER_START_PRODUCTION
          The amount of energon production per round a tower starts with
static double YIELD_BONUS
          Percent of upkeep returned per unused bytecode for ending the round early
